# GitHub Copilot Configuration

This folder hosts repository-level guidance for GitHub Copilot in VS Code.

- [copilot-instructions.md](copilot-instructions.md) steers Copilot Chat and inline suggestions toward the practices described there.

Quick tips
- Keep the GitHub Copilot and Copilot Chat extensions up to date in VS Code.
- When you ask Copilot Chat for changes, name files and the exact intent (what/why) to reduce rewrites.
- Review generated code, run tests, and commit with clear messages after accepting suggestions.
